analysis.description:
Crowdsale.earlyParticipantWhitelist (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#279-281) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investInternal (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#346-392)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol:
	Contract GetWhitelist has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#941-942)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#475-488):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#485-486)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#488)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#346-392):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#352-360)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#365-367)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#379-380)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#377-379)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#346-392):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#352-360)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#365-367)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#380-384)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#381-384)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#305-336):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#317-320)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#330-332)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#335-336)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#320-321)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#325-326)

Reentrancy in GetCrowdsale.GetCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#945-955):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_presaleFinalizeAgent.isSane()) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#952-953)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockTime (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#954)
	- presaleFinalizeAgent (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#954-955)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#346-392):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#352-360)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#365-367)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#371-374)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#371)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#374-376)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#403-419):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#405-406)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#412-413)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#413-414)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#412)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#410-412)

Reentrancy in GetCrowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#966-977):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#967-968)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol)
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#974-977)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#971-974)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#970-971)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#609-635) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#623-635)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#621-635)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#237-239)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#225-226)
MintableToken.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x5fe3342c5be7bece5318977c76ef7382323917b7.sol#799)
